pros: Great community of people. Employees treated well
cons: Humboldt is a very isolated area

job_title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist in Arcata, CA
pros: People are so nice and employees are treated well
cons: Not alot of variety in the job

job_title: Physician Assistant%2C PA-C in Arcata, CA
pros:
Holistic healthcare model with diverse services and a strong orientation to serving the needs of the Indian community. Insurance concerns are seldom an issue. Strong cultural orientation, awareness and ongoing training. Good benefits and time off. Paid educational leave and administrative time. Good facility. Occasional availability of scribes. Diverse range of specialties among colleagues. Amicable workplace. 
North coast of California. Diverse opportunities at satellite clinics
cons: Administration sometimes insensitive and ineffective. Wonky NextGen electronic health records system. Growing pressure to be more productive

pros: Friendly coworkers, cultural training, benefits for full-time. Healthcare not as good as formerly.
cons: Current management is anti labor. Understaffing, work speed-ups, inadequate training is the new norm in the Lab. No chance for advancement; promotions not given. Native American preference ignored. Management disrespectful to employees while being overpaid themselves.

pros: Everyone in the office is extremely caring, helpful, and passionate for what they do.  I was handed quite a bit of responsibility from the start which felt pretty cool.  It also paid really well.
cons: I spent a lot of time sitting at my desk trying to figure out how to be useful.  There was no training for the position, and it seemed like a lot of the time no one knew what assignments that I could take part in.

review_title: Indian Health Service gives excellent care to patients
job_title: Medical Officer in Acoma Pueblo, NM
pros: Every patient I cared for received the cre they needed in a timely fashion and without difficulty.
cons: Top officials do not listen to the providers enough.  They eventually changed at the service unit I worked for and all began to go smoothly.

pros: Great colleagues, felt like family, employee activities, etc
cons: most employees stressed and a bit overworked, poor communication within the system

job_title: Biomedical Equipment Support Specialist in Sells, AZ
pros: Great people to work for, job security, and great benefits.
cons: They are usually in very remote areas.

pros: The clinic is reflective of the culture. Great area and relatively new facilities.
cons: No raises, very political and high turnover due to rumors.  No improvement.
